transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello sir ji.

Customer: Haan boliye.

Executive: Sir meri baat suniye.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Ji main Sanjay baat kar raha hun sir head office IndiaMART Noida se launch head.

Customer: Are aap log sare hi head hai kya mujhe samajh nahi aata hai. Jo bhi koi phone karta hai sab head hai.

Executive: Sir isse pehle meri team ne call kiya tha aapko Aman Gupta aur Manish Kumar hai meri team ke andar. Aap aapka level kya hai L1 L2 L3 L4. Main L3 baat kar raha hun sir.

Customer: L3.
Executive: Meri team mein meri team mein L2 hai Manish Manish Kumar. Aur L1 unke under mein Mishra Aman Gupta.

Customer: Achcha boliye. Actually sir main Banglamukhi District Private Limited ye profile meri team ke paas mein. Main iske regarding aapse baat karna chah raha tha actually.

Customer: Main aap logon ko aap logon ko ek aadmi ko bolne se usko samajh nahi aata hai shayad. Main bola ki mera aur ek profile hai Velvet Papers karke.

Executive: Ji ji ji ji kuch maine abhi kiya hai sir matlab tabhi maine aapko call kiya hai.

Customer: Are chor ko main bol raha hun chor pakadna hai aap chor ke sath hi mere ko baat karaenge.

Executive: Nahi nahi sir main thoda sa client tabhi maine aapko directly modified karke main dekh raha hun ki Raj ko diya gaya hai aur Rahul. To bhai jinhone kiya hai unhi se mere ko baat kara rahe aap log.

Customer: Nahi nahi nahi baat nahi kara rahe hain sir main thoda sa samajhna chah raha hun taki main usko aur better. Aman ko Aman ko dekhiye na Aman ne mere ko message kiya ki sir unse baat kar lijiye wo theek kar denge. Main to samajh hi nahi raha hun ki aap logon ka. Nahi nahi nahi sir aapko baat nahi karni. Aapko baat nahi karni baat hum hi karenge. Gardan gardan bachane ke liye mere ko hi bol raha hai ki chor se baat kar lijiye sir.

Executive: Nahi sir aapko baat nahi karni hai. Hamara internal department hai hum hi baat karenge iske regarding. Bas mujhe thoda sa clarity aap logon ka ghanta department hai aap logon ka ghanta department hai sun lijiye mere muh se ab apshabd niklega. Aap logon ka department ghanta department hai.

Customer: Sala ek ko bol raha hai har koi head hai waha pe. Team se baat karaiye ya koi L4 level ke aadmi se baat karaiye teen account chal rahe hai aapke waha pe.

Executive: Hmm hmm. Mazak nahi rakhte aap log.

Executive: Nahi sir main head hi baat kar raha hun tabhi maine aapko directly call milaya iske andar nobody going to call you sir first of all. Agar aapke paas sabhi call kar rahe hain iske regarding I will take care ki nobody going to call you regarding the same nobody going to drop your message. Sir mujhe to samajh hi nahi aa raha hai main kisse baat kar raha hun. Har koi head hai har koi team manager hai. Main ab kaise main aapko mail kar du sir iske regarding head matlab along with my designations and all official mail ID se agar aap chahe. Matlab just for the clarity ki main tabhi aapko directly call kar raha hun iske andar. Bachcha bachcha mujhe samajh aa raha hai ki wo sab bachcha bachcha ladka sab hai tu kya kaat raha hai mera.

Executive: Nahi sir dekhiye complaint aayi hai tabhi hum bhi aapko baat kar rahe hain na sir otherwise to koi bhi call nahi karta aapko iske andar aur meri team ne yahi bola hai mujhe jaake ki wo call to kar raha hai.

Customer: Kis team se problem hua hai us aadmi bar bar mujhe call kiya ja raha hai.

Executive: To sir aapki jo ye paisa aap keh rahe hain jo Velvet Papers Private Limited ke andar aapne diya hai ye with a wrong communication diya gaya hai matlab.

Customer: Haan wrong communication nahi to main thodi bar bar mein paise dene jaunga.

Executive: Abhi aap kya chah rahe hain sir thoda sa mujhe clarity bataiye main apne internal department se internally baat karunga iske andar. What is your like final decision.

Customer: Dekhiye agar isko further le jana hai to main consumer forum mein case karunga aur aapka LinkedIn aur X mein main dalunga. Theek hai agar wo sab mein jana hai.

Executive: Tabhi to main aapse puch raha hun sir main tabhi to aapko permission le raha hun sir aapse.

Customer: Kya cheez?

Executive: Main tabhi to aapse puchna chah raha hun sir abhi aap kya chah rahe hain ye jo company mein aapne.

Customer: Aap logon ke aap logon ke waha pe complaint resolution koi department nahi hai ya aap log ye jo manager sab hai.

Executive: Sir complaint forum hamare paas mein rehti hai in case agar hamare executives ya unke jo managers hain sir agar koi proper solution nahi de pate to hum bilkul intervene karte hain hum complaint forum se ye baat kar rahe hain hamara dono kaam hai servicing at least complaint forum. Aap bataiye to sahi sir aap apna point to rakhiye abhi jo aapka point hai sir Velvet Papers Private Limited jo abhi aapne bola bhi jo meri team ne abhi bataya. Full refund chahiye mujhe jo maine jo wo paise mere se galat communication karke liya gaya wo full refund chahiye mujhe aur turant chahiye.

Customer: Kyunki aapke waha pe Gaurav ne bola ki sir agar aise galti hua hoga to aapka payment aa jayega. Kyunki aa jana chahiye tha.

Executive: Okay.

Customer: Par par ab tak aap logon ke taraf se bakchodi chale hi ja raha hai. Matlab abhi aise apshabd mujhe use karna matlab main bahut frustrated ho gaya hun aap logon ke team se.

Executive: I will take care sir first of all main aapka concern area tabhi maine aapko call kiya hai.

Customer: 10 bar sala call aaya ja raha hai. Jo bol raha hun wo koi sunne ke liye aap logon mein se tayar nahi hai har koi manager hai sala.

Executive: To abhi aap ye chah rahe hain Velvet ke andar sir jo aapka paisa aapne diya uska refund chah rahe hain aap right correct.

Customer: Pura refund chah raha hun main.

Executive: Theek hai sir main update kar deta hun. Ek bar main team ko update kar raha hun aur bar bar sir koi aapko call nahi karega.

Customer: Action kya rahega ki ye rongful communication ka action kya rahega wo mujhe over mail chahiye.

Executive: Ji bilkul sir aapko mail mil jayega iske regarding but thoda sa main ek bar internally aur baat kar leta hun. Baki mail aur aapka jo solution hai main aage forward kar raha hun you will get the solution of your problem sir for sure.

Customer: Theek hai. Par aap logon ke complaint resolution ka mujhe koi department abhi tak samajh nahi. Main ticket chal rahi hai sir main aapko ticket ID bata deta hun agar aap you want ki aapki complaint suna. Ticket ID mein kya bola. Chor isko chor ko pakadne bola wahi chor ko de diya aap log.

Executive: Nahi sir aapke complaint hamare paas mein hai. Aisa nahi hai warna to usse mera usi partner se koi matlab nahi hai matlab jo aapke different wo person hai.

Customer: Sab aap log mili bhagat hai dekhiye sab aap log mili bhagat hai. Sir warna main aapko kyun bolta aap Sudita sir unse baat kar lijiye.

Executive: Sudita sir aap ye bataiye ek cheez bataiye to main aapko kyun bolta main aapko solution dunga. Maine aapse pehle ye pucha aap kya chah rahe hain aapne kaha mujhe refund chah raha hun to main team mein jo Aman hai usko puchiye to aadhe ghante pehle usne kyun bola ki sir Himanshu se baat kar lijiye aap.

Executive: Main ek bar check kar leta hun warna sir aapse maine yahi pucha na sir aap kya chah rahe ho aapne kaha sir mujhe refund chahiye plus action chahiye maine dono pe haan bola sir aapko main bol deta sir nahi ho payega jo bhi main manage kar sakta tha.

Customer: To aap log de hi rahe ho. Us par mujhe samajh nahi aa raha hai.

Executive: Sir main complaint forum se hi baat kar raha hun aapne jo bola hai main bilkul usko abhi jaake escalate kar raha hun tabhi main aapse samajhna chah raha tha sir. Main abhi jaake escalate kar raha hun you will get the solution of your problem for sure sir. Ye meri surety hai aapko.

Customer: To wahi log mujhe call karke request kar rahe hain.

Executive: Nahi wo call nahi karenge sir wo call nahi karenge. Bar bar call kar rahe hain.

Customer: Jo cheez galat bol raha hun wo call karke prove karna chah rahe hain ki main galat hun.

Executive: Nahi nahi sir main aapko clear kar deta hun nobody going to call you first of all theek hai. Baki aapki complaint yaha par registered hai Velvet ke andar ye Banglamukhi mein bhi raise hogi sir jo main yaha par Banglamukhi wali kyunki wo aapka Banglamukhi se nahi na Velvet ke regarding to Velvet ke regarding aapka ticket ID run kar raha hai. Jo Velvet ke andar jo.

Customer: Velvet ke Velvet mein hi main bol raha hun is complaint ko pehle karke solution denge aap log uske baad main aage aur account ke bare mein baat karunga.

Executive: Bilkul bilkul sir bilkul bilkul sir hoga. Baki aapne galti se Banglamukhi mein bhi raise kar diya sir 965511 jiska ID hai to ye to main band kar sakta hun Banglamukhi wali Velvet wali aapki run kar rahi hai iska main mail bhi abhi aapko drop kar raha hun iske regarding Velvet ke regarding.

Executive: Theek hai aur koi aapko call nahi karega sir I will give you the solution jo abhi aapne mujhse mang raha hai.

Customer: Hello.

Customer: Haan theek hai.

Executive: Theek hai sir main aapko dobara coordinate karunga ek bar uske regarding baki ek bar main internally pehle baat karunga sir theek hai okay thank you.

Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants a refund for Velvet Papers Private Limited.

- Alleges wrong communication led to payment.

- Expresses frustration with multiple calls, no resolution.

- Wants action against wrongful communication.



Resolution:

- Executive assured no further calls from the team.

- Promised to escalate the issue and provide a solution.

- Will send an email regarding the action taken.

- Assured resolution through complaint forum.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will coordinate and talk internally.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, complaint, communication, resolution, velvet papers
